lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Where did the wise men come from? What things did they believe?
answers: From the east, they believed stars could tell mysteries about the future
From Rome, they believed in military power
From Egypt, they studied medicine
From Jerusalem, they studied God's law

questions.text: Why did the wise men follow the star to Jerusalem?
answers: They believed a child had been born to be king of the Jews
They thought it marked a great battle
They were looking for a lost treasure
They wanted to meet King Herod
Known as Herod the Great, he was the evil king of the people of Judah
A kind ruler who loved the people
A priest in the temple
A Roman soldier

questions.text: King Herod asked, 'Where is the Messiah to be born?' What did his servants say?
answers: The prophet Micah says he'll be born in Bethlehem
He'll appear in Jerusalem inside God's temple
He'll be born in Rome in Caesar's palace
We don't know

questions.text: What did Herod tell the wise men to do?
answers: Find the child, report back to him so he could worship him, too
Bring the child to the palace
Ignore the star and go home
Stay in Jerusalem for one year

questions.text: How did the wise men find Jesus' house?
answers: God made the star appear above it
They asked the shepherds
They searched every house
They followed Joseph

questions.text: What did the wise men do when they found Jesus?
answers: Worshiped him, gave him gold, frankincense, and myrrh
Told him bedtime stories
Took him gifts of food
Asked him to come to their country

questions.text: What warning did God give the wise men? What did they do?
answers: Don't go back to Herod, they went home on a different road
Go back and tell Herod everything
Wait in Jerusalem until morning
Forget that you saw Jesus

questions.text: What did the angel in Joseph's dream tell him to do? Why?
answers: Hide in Egypt because Herod wanted to kill Jesus
Return to Nazareth immediately
Send Jesus to live with family far away
Go back to Bethlehem

questions.text: After Herod died, what did Joseph and his family do?
answers: Return to Israel to live in the tiny town of Nazareth
Stay in Egypt forever
Move to Jerusalem
Travel back to Bethlehem
